page.title: 11SCHOOLS IN SLEAFORD
page.content:
THERE ARE 3 SCHOOLS IN SLEAFORD,THE GRAMMAR,HIGH SCHOOL AND ST GEORGES.THE GRAMMAR IS FOR BOYS WHO PASS THE 11 PLUS AND THE HIGH SCHOOL IS FOR GIRLS. ST GEORGES COMPRISES OF 3 PERMANENT BUILDINGS,2 CLASSROOM BLOCKS,THE BREALEY BUILDING,7 MOBILE BUILDINGS ST GEORGES HAS ABOUT 800 PUPILS,WHO COME FROM THE SLEAFORD AREA.MOST WALK OR COME BY BUS BUT SOME COME BY TRAIN. THERE ARE 8 35 MINUTE LESSONS A DAY AS WELL AS A MORNING AND AFTERNOON BREAK AND DINNER TIME.THE SCHOOL RUNS SCHOOL MEALS BUT A LOT OF PEOPLE GO DOWN TOWN AT DINNER. THERE IS A J0INT SIX FORM BETWEEN THE THREE SCHOOLS.
{BY BOB WALLIS (AGE 15) { }
